item.title: An in-depth guide to writing full-fledged LaTeX in html using ox-hugo
item.description: LaTeX is the one and only language to typeset math- and logicrelated formulas in a way that is both exact and aesthetically pleasing. And this is just the tip of the iceberg: There are many other features LaTeX has to offer. In this post, we will have a look at how to configure emacs and ox-hugo to allow you to get any (Xe)LaTeX formula, figure or whatnot into your html file, how to style them correctly and how to refrence them in-text.
